name: leather and fabric purse
description:
A cute fabric and leather purse.

Luxury Italian fabric front with a semi shiny red leather back this little purse is sure to please. It has a zipper closure and bright patterned cotton fabric lining.

Size: Length 6' (15 cm ) at the widest point and 4 1/2" (11.5cm) at the zip. 
Height at the centre 4" (10cm)

Small enough to fit in your pocket or hold in your hand, large enough to hold a mobile phone and cards.

Available in cream, black, red, pink, dusty blue green, yellow.
This would make a lovely gift.

name: Micro mini zipper pouch bag
description:
A mini zipper pouch in lovely leather and rich textured italian fabric.

Inside there is a phone pocket and the zipped front will keep your treasures safe. The main body of the bag closes with a magnetic clasp.
Fittings on the strap are antique brass.

The mini zipper is 23 cm high and 17 cm wide.
 
Bag is posted in a keep sake box.

Also available in a cream coloured fabric

name: Double zipper Sue bag in cottage garden
description:
The Sue Double zipper bag features lovely serene blue handprinted flowers on linen by Thea & Sami.

The bag is made of quality black leather with a webbing strap.

The zippers have extra long zinc pulls to match the strap buckles.

Large deep front pocket with zip closure. Inside there is a leather phone pocket and a small pocket.

Top closes with a welted zipper insert allowing the bag to expand when full and look flat when empty.

The lovely handprinted linen has been sprayed with a quality french product that keeps it dry and dust free.

The back of the bag is plain black leather with a feature seam that has been top stitched.

The size of the bag is 

Length 30 cm

Width 25 cm

Depth 4 cm

Adjustable strap width is 4 cm length is 139 cm at the longest.

Also available in cream and red cottage garden fabric.

This bag has been made on an old industrial sewing machine in my solar powered studio.

For more bags please visit my blog www.missymaomao.blogspot.com

name: Hydrangea pouch
description:
Lovely leather and handprinted linen pouch. 
The leather is a lovely deep brown and the fabric is handprinted and designed in Australia by Thea & Sami. 

The pouch is 20cm long and 11 cm high. 

Inside there is small pocket for cards. 

Available in red, blue or cream hydrangea fabric.

My bags are all made by the designer on an old industrial sewing machine using solar power.

name: leather cottage garden messenger bag
description:
Leather messenger bag features handprinted linen fabric by Australian fabric designer Thea & Sami. 

The black leather is lovely and soft and contrasts nicely with the linen fabric pocket panel. 
Iside there is a phone pocket in the large front pocket and a smaller pocket in the main interior of the bag. The bag is lined in black poly cotton. The adjustable strap is made from quality webbing. The flap closes with an antique brass magnetic clasp. The back of the bag is plain black leather with a double top stitched seam. 

The bag is about 30 cm wide and 26 cm high with a width of 5 cm. The bag is soft so it's flexible. I can get an iPad in the front pocket neatly but easily in the main body of the bag. 

The fabric has been coated with a protective spray which aids in repelling dust and moisture. 

I think this is one of the nicest bags I have ever made.

Also available in Blue or cream cottage garden fabric.
